title: Pictured: Diego Costa in Chelsea training ground ‘scrap’, David Luiz involved
text:
SKY SPORTS Luiz and Costa pounced in training 
The Blues striker, 28, appeared to be in good spirits this morning when he tried to put a coach in a cardboard box . 
And his fun-loving nature continued on the pitch in the training session. 
Costa teamed up with fellow Chelsea star David Luiz to take one unsuspecting man - who we can’t identify from the Sky Sports shots - by surprise. 
It’s unclear who it is but Luiz and Costa sneak up and pull his hood over his head. 
SKY SPORTS They grapple with the unidentifiable man and pull his hood over his head 
SKY SPORTS Costa goes in for a playful headlock 
SKY SPORTS Diego Costa and David Luiz team up on an unsuspecting victim 
Costa then swooped to get the poor chap in a headlock while Luiz held him from behind. 
None of the other players seem to batter an eyelid, though, with Michy Batshuayi and Eden Hazard going about their business as if nothing’s going on!. 
Luiz allowed the ‘victim’ to escape but Costa wasn’t letting go - smiling as he pulled the unidentifiable man to the floor. 
But it was all in good spirits as shows the mood is unsurprisingly high in the camp. 
SKY SPORTS While Luiz is watching on from behind 
SKY SPORTS Costa clearly likes a tussle on the pitch - and on the training ground 
SKY SPORTS Eventually Costa and Luiz let him go Diego Costa puts coach in a box in training Thursday, 23rd February 2017 DIEGO COSTA put one of the Chelsea staff in a cardboard box today. 1 / 9 SKY SPORTS NEWS 
A source who witnessed the incident said: “It was all in good spirits and nothing more than a playground fight! 
“Diego Costa is always a livewire around the training ground and he’s always cracking the jokes.” 
Chelsea are eight points clear at the top of the table ahead of their home clash with Swansea on Saturday. Related articles
